role_description: An Ansible role that installs pup (a CLI for parsing HTML) on nearly any system
role_description_full_overview: [pup](https://github.com/ericchiang/pup) is a command line tool for processing HTML. It reads from stdin, prints to stdout, and allows the user to filter parts of the page using CSS selectors.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs pup (a CLI for parsing HTML) on nearly any system.
